title: 如何衍生ooc代码
txt_content:
Only One Command 简称 OOC，意为将多条命令压缩成一条，在执行时自动展开并部署命令方块。



提示: 
命令可以选择已创建的OOC或是自身，但最多只能递归1次。
一条ooc的范例，给予一本显示所有玩家的魔法书，下一步发送一条/say @a的命令【两者皆为脉冲】/summon minecraft:falling_block ~ ~1 ~ {id:"minecraft:falling_block",Time:1,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:command_block",Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:falling_block",Time:1,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:command_block",Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:falling_block",Time:1,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:command_block",Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:falling_block",Time:1,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:command_block",Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:falling_block",Time:1,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:command_block",Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:falling_block",Time:1,DropItem:0,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Motion:[0d,-1d,0d]}],Motion:[0d,-1d,0d],TileEntityData:{auto:0,Command:"/setblock ~ ~2 ~ minecraft:command_block 0 replace  {auto:1,Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~-6 ~ air"}"}}],Motion:[0d,-1d,0d],TileEntityData:{auto:0,Command:""}}],Motion:[0d,-1d,0d],TileEntityData:{auto:1,Command:"/say @a"}}],Motion:[0d,-1d,0d],TileEntityData:{auto:1,Command:"/give @p minecraft:written_book 1 0 {display:{Name:"一本魔法书",Lore:["由ooc代码生成"]},Unbreakable:1,title:"CB Creator",author:"2398954487",pages:["[{\\"text\\":\\"现存玩家\\",\\"color\\":\\"dark_aqua\\",\\"bold\\":true,\\"italic\\":false,\\"underlined\\":false,\\"strikethrough\\":false,\\"obfuscated\\":false},{\\"selector\\":\\"@a\\",\\"bold\\":false,\\"italic\\":false,\\"underlined\\":true,\\"strikethrough\\":false,\\"obfuscated\\":false}]"]}"}}]}复制代码
